thread.title: 62 Politicians & Counting Are Boycotting Trump's Inauguration
thread.title_full: 62 Politicians & Counting Are Boycotting Trump's Inauguration

author: Just Jared
title: 62 Politicians & Counting Are Boycotting Trump's Inauguration
text:
Donald Trump ‘s presidential inauguration will be held TODAY (January 20) and there are going to be many politicians not in attendance because they plan on boycotting the event.
The most high-profile boycotter on the list is definitely Georgia’s Rep. John Lewis , who announced he would not be attending the inauguration because he doesn’t consider Trump to be a legitimate president.
VIDEO : Watch the live stream of the inauguration right here 
Trump responded to the comment by saying Lewis , who marched with Martin Luther King Jr. during the Civil Rights movement, was “all talk, talk talk” and suggested he “spend more time on fixing and helping his district, which is in horrible shape and falling apart.”
Many more politicians, including Senator John Kerry , have said they will not be attending the inauguration, though they have not given a reason.
Click inside for the list of politicians not attending the inauguration…
